pair.value: Positive review : Send email to constituent. Negative review : Go back to handle review.

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Hi,


Kindly save this issue ID for further correspondence.


Regards,



")

notify.text:
=concatenate("

This task needs to be handled and status should be changed on high priority.

")
notify.subject: ="The Task """ & tp!name & """ of the """ & pp!name & """ Process has been escalated."

acp.name: Message
acp.a:expr: ="The amount "&pv!issue.monetaryAward&" has been awarded to constituent "&pv!issue.constituentInfo.firstName&" "&pv!issue.constituentInfo.lastName&" ."

annotation.text: LC: To register the issue and route it to appropriate caseworker
